#Text=United States : Dr. Larry Nassar sentenced in sexual abuse case
#Text=Saturday , January 27 , 2018
#Text=Former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar was sentenced to prison on Wednesday for 40 to 175 years in Ingham County , Michigan , United States .
#Text=Nassar pleaded guilty in November to seven charges of sexual assault in Ingham County , however , he is alleged to have victimized over a hundred girls over several years .
#Text=Nassar is currently serving a 60-year sentence for federal child pornography charges .
#Text=Judge Rosemarie Aquilina , presiding over the Ingham County Circuit Court in Lansing , Michigan , handed down the sentence , stating :
#Text=" I 've just signed your death warrant .

#Text=In the statement , Nassar wrote ,  I was a good doctor , because my treatments worked and those patients that are now speaking out are the same ones that kept coming back over and over " .

column1: #Text=He also criticized an earlier judge for going " ballistic " .
#Text=Aquilina declined to read the entirety , citing concern for the victims ;
#Text=" I do n't want them re-victimized by the words in the letter " , she said .
#Text=Nassar served as the team physician for USA Gymnastics for years , spanning four Olympic Games .
#Text=Simultaneously , he served with Michigan State University .
#Text=He abused his victims under pretense of treating them as a doctor .
#Text=Nassar 's case has led to allegations of lack of oversight by Michigan State University , USA Gymnastics , and the United States Olympic Committee ( USOC ) .
#Text=At USA Gymnastics , prior to the sentencing three board members resigned over the case on Monday , as well as its president last year .
#Text=Corporate sponsors of the organization also pulled out .

#Text=The current president of USA Gymnastics , Kerry Perry , who was appointed in December , released a statement after the sentencing : " During the last seven days , more than 150 courageous women have shared their deeply personal experiences and how Larry Nassar ’s despicable crimes impacted their lives . [ ... ] USA Gymnastics applauds Judge Rosemarie Aquilina for handing Nassar the maximum sentence of up to 175 years[ ... ]
